title: BRITISH PRIME MINISTER CAMERON WILL ATTEND CHOGM IN SRI LANKA – DR CHRIS NONIS
content: British Prime Minister Rt Hon David Cameron, and Foreign Secretary Rt Hon William Hague, will be attending the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting (CHOGM) in Sri Lanka, Dr Chris Nonis, Sri Lankan High Commissioner to the UK confirmed.
